nnsec.client
Class Calculator

java.lang.Object
  nnsec.client.Calculator
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.rmi.Remote, CalculatorIFace
public class Calculator
extends java.lang.Object
implements CalculatorIFace

Calculator is the class that client pass to the server (as a remote reference) so that the server can use this class to compute some values that it is not able to compute himself.

Nested Class Summary
static class Calculator.ProtocolException
          Exception thrown when trying to exploit the protocol, and then some errors occur.
static class Calculator.UnsupportedFunctionException
          Exception thrown when trying to ask for a function, and then this function doesn't exist.

computeValue

public java.lang.String computeValue(java.lang.String value,
                                     java.lang.String function)
                              throws Calculator.ProtocolException,
                                     Calculator.UnsupportedFunctionException
Implementation of computeValue method from CalculatorIFace, this method computes submitted value with specified function and returns the result. In fact, it decrypts value, computes it and then encrypts back before to return. This method is used by the worker like an activation function.

Specified by:
computeValue in interface CalculatorIFace
Parameters:
value - ciphered form of the value to be computed.
function - function to be used.
Returns:
chipered computed value.
Throws:
Calculator.ProtocolException - thrown as a consequence of errors during encryption/decryption session.
Calculator.UnsupportedFunctionException - thrown as a consequence of unsupported function or null function pointer.

mangleValue

public java.lang.String mangleValue(java.lang.String value,
                                    java.lang.String function)
                             throws Calculator.ProtocolException,
                                    Calculator.UnsupportedFunctionException
Implementation of mangleValue method from CalculatorIFace, this method computes submited value with specified function and returns the result. In fact, it decrypts value, computes it and then encrypts back before to return. This method is udes by the worker like an output function.

Specified by:
mangleValue in interface CalculatorIFace
Parameters:
value - ciphered form of the value to be computed.
function - function to be used.
Returns:
chipered computed value.
Throws:
Calculator.ProtocolException - thrown as a consequence of errors during encryption/decryption session.
Calculator.UnsupportedFunctionException - thrown as a consequence of unsupported function or null function pointer.
